author: lzybkr
body: Because this class is internal, the Close method does nothing (calls base, which does nothing), and nobody can derive from PSHostTraceListener to override that behavior.

comments.author: joeyaiello
comments.body: Then this sounds like code cleanup that we don't need for 6.0.0.

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: It is not clear that the fix will be - remove PSHostTraceListener.Dispose() method?

title: PSHostTraceListener has redundant IDisposable implementation
